description: (Michael Buffer: And now, ladies and gentlemen, let's get ready to play Jeopardy!)

final_jeopardy.clue_text: This title person asks a pile of money, "What art thou good for?... one of those knives is worth all this heap"

jeopardy.clue_text: When it became independent in 1829, it was half its current size, but added Thessaly in 1881, Epirus in 1913...

title: Show #4535 - Friday, April 30, 2004
